EmailTemplate.subject: Five 2015 IT Predictions: Azure Will Toyota the Public Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Five 2015 IT Predictions
View the Infographic <http://vmturbo.com/blog/2015-it-industry-predictions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=predictions&utm+content=010915> <http://vmturbo.com/blog/2015-it-industry-predictions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=predictions&utm+content=010915> {{Lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, 2014 sure was a busy year, but now that December 31st has come and gone, it’s time to look forward. Our experts, VMTurbo co-founders Yechiam Yemini (YY) and Yuri Rabover, accompanied by Principal Solutions Engineer and Technology Evangelist Eric Wright (aka @discoposse <https://twitter.com/discoposse>), weighed in on what’s in store for 2015. Click here <http://vmturbo.com/blog/2015-it-industry-predictions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=predictions&utm+content=010915> for a brief look at what they had to say.
View Infographic <http://vmturbo.com/blog/2015-it-industry-predictions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=predictions&utm+content=010915>> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
